header-0.description: Use the button below to create a boilerplate settings file on your desktop.

header-1.description: After you have added rules for your applications, use the 'hamburger' menu to import the settings file.

header-2.description: If you are modifying existing settings, use the 'hamburger menu to export the current settings.

header-3.description: Then make the modifications and re-import.
